function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Rapidly evolving crisis","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Physical and mental safety of learners","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Propagation of contagious diseases due to increased interconnectedness and decentralization of society.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 due to lack of containment measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Long-term economic impact of permissioned blockchain for providing data sharing from the medical perspective.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Utilizing a centralized cloud-based storing service to ensure the availability of medical data.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Enhancing security considerations when sharing sensitive data with the deployment of a discrete wavelet transform and a genetic algorithm technique.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of unauthorized access to sensitive patient data due to
